subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Television
lead_paragraph: In 1979, NBC agreed to pre-empt Saturday morning cartoons in favor of tennis from Wimbledon, but the precise, on-the-hour starting time proved problematic.
snippet: In 1979, NBC agreed to pre-empt Saturday morning cartoons in favor of tennis from Wimbledon, but the precise, on-the-hour starting time proved problematic.
